choices: He want to bulked up to the max
He wanted a moderate boost in strength
He want to bulk a little to test the power
1.content:
In the world where neopians lived there stood among them a hero named E-Hero Neos. He watches over his fellow friends and citizens from danger and evil doers.

One day while he was training, he found an ancient book explaining the true potential of the red gem engraved on his chest.

As he read further the book tell him that when the red gem on his chest was glowing , the book tell his that if he pushed the red gem while it was glowing he would have gotten a new power which is to alter his strength by only concentrating on how he would grow, where he would grow and how much he would grow.

The book also tell him that after he had push the gem when it glowing , the power he would receive would become permanent.

Feeling curious Neos went training vigourously to make the gem on his chest glow. He knew by exerting pressure on himself the gem would start to glow.

After a few hour of vigourous training, the gem on his chest started to glow...

Neos hesitated a bit but after a while he push the red gem on his chest.

The gem were pushed as if it was a button or something..

Suddenly after Neos push the gem on his chest, he felt a tingling sensation as he was indowed with a bright light which surrounds him.
He felt enpowered and refreshed.

Hmmmm.... Time to test this new power.... Emmmm ..... But how much i want to grow.... Hmmmmmm
1.title: NEW Discovery

choices: He went to test his power
The gem on his chest acts on his thought (He wants more)
The gem kept increase his strength (Doesnt seem to stop)
11.content:
He then wanted to increase his strength to the max, so he began to focus on his strength and pushed the gem on his chest.

For a minute, nothing happens but then he felt sharp pain went down his spine and a warm feeling spread across his body.He began to felt some intense feeling inside his body .

As he grasp his hand tight, he began to felt numerous pain throughout his body.He struggled hard to fight this pain that began to intensify and amplify the amount of pain inside of him.

His muscle then began to increase in size and strengthen. At first his old muscular body seemed like an athletic built body but now it began to inflate in endless muscle which began to pile up inside of him. His arm was the first to bulge much more bigger than before. It kept to increase and became much more bigger. Next was his biceps which are piling up with mountainous pounds of muscles and power. It now looks like 3 cannonballs are stuffed inside of his arm. Then the growth went to his body. His pecs began to enlarge and were filing up nicely with his new body, it increase as it looked like a slabs of muscle was implanted inside his chest. Then his abs were beginning to form much more defined shape and are bulging with muscles.

The final wave of muscle growth went down to his legs, it began to pile up with mound of muscle and so does his calf which are swelling up at a fast rate.His legs now was swelling with muscle and strength. After 3 hours of pain, the pain dies away and the growth slows down and then stopped.

He got on his feet and began to examine his new figure. There he stood, as a gigantic titan of pure strength and muscle built, his body was rippling with muscle and strength. He is now looks like a muscle bound hero , filled with muscle and power.

(To see how E-Hero Neos looks like, use this link <http://muk100.deviantart.com/art/Max-E-Hero-Neos-92220854>)

Then .............
11.title: He want to bulked up to the max

info.brief_description: About E-Hero Neos real life outside the world of YU-GI-OH where he found a new power
info.description:
Its about when E-Hero Neos found out that he has a new power which is to alter his body's strength by increasing his muscle mass and strengthen his muscle.

In this story you all must keep the story focused on only E-Hero Neos

But you all can decide whether he use his power to help people like his name suggest and be a hero , or do mischief.
Its all up to you guys .

The transformation allowed is muscle growth only..
No gay stuff....

K all u guys have fun
